name: Triceratops
description: A large herbivorous dinosaur with three horns.

name: Brachiosaurus
description: A gigantic herbivorous dinosaur with a long neck.

name: Stegosaurus
description: A large herbivorous dinosaur with plates along its back.

name: Spinosaurus
description: A large carnivorous dinosaur with a sail on its back.

name: Ankylosaurus
description: A large herbivorous dinosaur with a club tail.

name: Dilophosaurus
description: A medium-sized carnivorous dinosaur with a crest on its head.
